name: Horrid Spider Endless Survival Arena
description:
You start with 1 projectile per shoot and for every 5 kills you get an additional one up to 100.

There are 4 spawners that duplicate the spawning speed every 20 seconds up to 64 spiders per second, so on full speed the game spawns 256 spiders per second.

Each kill gives you 100 points and when you die you'll see your final score.

WASD to move, SPACE to jump, LMB to shoot and ESC to open the menu.
